title: HOUR 3-Johnny Bench and Reggie Miller 081820
itunes:title: HOUR 3-Johnny Bench and Reggie Miller 081820
description:
Johnny Bench tells Dan the only rule he knows in baseball is hit the ball as far as you can. Johnny says he has not problem with swinging on a 3-0 pitch when your up big in a baseball game. Reggie Miller tells Dan why the Mavericks will have problems with the Clipper's height and length in their opening round series.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
